text.survival_expansion.dead_disconnect:
You have no more respawn available.
The next recovery time is %s
text.survival_expansion.help_command:
§6*********************************************** 
§6|                                              §6| 
§6|          §fSurvivalExpansion Help Menu:         §6| 
§6|                                              §6| 
§6*********************************************** 
§e/survivalexpansion§7 §fhelp§7 --- Open help menu 
§e/survivalexpansion §frespawnAvailable§7 ---Check remaining respawn times for §a<player>

§fThank you for your support. 
If you have any questions, please contact me. 
§9GitHub: https://github.com/SkyIce0229/SurvivalExpansion

text.survival_expansion.only_player_erro: §l§cThis command can only be used by players.
